Pre-Game Insights: India sailed through to the T20 World Cup 2024 semi-final setting up a blockbuster clash with England in a repeat of the T20 World Cup 2022 semi-final in Adelaide.
England, finishing 2nd in the T20 World Cup 2024 Super 8 Group 2, will meet the unbeaten Indian side at Providence Stadium, Guyana on June 27 (8:00 PM IST) for a place in the final.

On November 10, 2022, England faced India at the Adelaide Oval in the 2nd semi-final of the T20 World Cup 2022, and England, the eventual winners, led by a demolition act from Jos Buttler and Alex Hales decimated India by 10 wickets, chasing down the target of 169, in just 16 overs and 10 wickets intact.
India were pre-determined to play in the second semi-final scheduled for Guyana on the 27 June 2024, as per ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2024 playing conditions.
